definition: to moisten/to grease/to apply (cream, ointment)/to dip a brush in ink
lit. to squeeze out toothpaste/fig. to extract a confession under pressure

sentences.english: Put the cap back on the toothpaste.
sentences.chinese: 把盖子重新拧在牙膏管上。

sentences.english: He unpacked his 72-hourbag, then repacked it. Did he have enough toothpaste and spare socks?
sentences.chinese: 他有足够的牙膏和备用的袜子吗？

sentences.english: He slowly squeezed some toothpaste from the tube.
sentences.chinese: 他慢慢地从牙膏管里挤出些牙膏。

sentences.english: He slowly squeezed some toothpaste from the tube.
sentences.chinese: 他慢慢地从牙膏管里挤出些牙膏。

sentences.english: The method is applied to determination of total and soluble fluoride in tooth pastes.
sentences.chinese: 该方法用于测定牙膏中总的溶解性氟化物。

sentences.english: He always squeezes toothpaste in the middle of the tube and makes a big noise when eating.
sentences.chinese: 他总是从中间开始挤牙膏，而且吃饭的时候吧唧嘴。

sentences.english: Fill in nail holes in drywall with  toothpaste and baking soda.
sentences.chinese: 牙膏与小苏打混合可以用来填补墙面的钉子洞。

sentences.english: Someone who gets tooth stains may want a whitening toothpaste.
sentences.chinese: 一些人牙齿染色的人可能需要增白牙膏。

sentences.english: Time like hardly using up dentifrice, as long as you crush it , it must have a little!
sentences.chinese: 时间就像快用完的牙膏，只要你去挤，总还有一点。

sentences.english: Your toothpaste tubes are all squeezed paper-thin.
sentences.chinese: 你的牙膏都被压得像纸那么薄。

sentences.english: Does Kunming Ten-li Long Street establish elegant toothpaste?
sentences.chinese: 昆明十里长街植雅牙膏？

sentences.english: A big advertising campaign to promote our new toothpaste.
sentences.chinese: 推销我厂新牙膏的一场大的广告宣传攻势。

sentences.english: Mickey:Okay. Do you squeeze the toothpaste from the top or the bottom?
sentences.chinese: 好的，那你挤牙膏的时候是从上面还是下面？

sentences.english: While you're brushing your teeth with a fluoride toothpaste, brush your tongue – especially the back of the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 当你用含氟化物的牙膏刷牙和清洁舌头特别是舌背时。

sentences.english: Invoid of cumbersome procedure of getting out toothpaste, convenient for anybody.
sentences.chinese: 避免繁琐的挤牙膏过程，适合大众便于使用。

sentences.english: Jim screwed the cap onto the tube of toothpaste.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆拧紧了牙膏管的盖子。
